results.title: Case Report and Literature Review: Bisphosphonate, Sirolimus, and Atenolol Treatment in a 4-Year-Old Child Diagnosed with Gorham-Stout Disease
results.text_hl: To our knowledge, this is the first reported case of @<m>DISEASE_Osteolysis_Essential</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010015 @@@GSD@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.
